name: recognizably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is easy to recognize: The creature was recognizably human. The setting for the play is recognizably New York. See
recognizable
More examplesFewer examplesWhen she smiled, she was recognizably the woman in the old pictures.The painting was recognizably a Picasso.The sound of the orchestra is recognizably Russian.His language and phrasing are recognizably Irish.
